name: Water Ball Challenge 10S
description:
Hi Guys! This is the very first game I made 

I learned a lot during this game jam including how to shot projectiles and make them interacting with other objects.

The goal is: FIRE water balls to break boxes until they hit the target!

You only have 10 seconds to break all the boxes that block your way to the target!

THINK FAST!

There are three kind of boxes in the game: the paper box, the plastic box, and the metal box. Each box has a different durability (took multiple hits to break) . There is also a cruel setting of this game: If you fail to hit the target, you’d have to start from the beginning.

I wish I could add more features in the game including random reward boxes (allow you to upgrade your weapon, freeze time, fire huge bullets to break a lot of boxes at one time, etc.), explosion boxes, moving boxes, and moving targets. But sadly I don’t have enough time to add those features, create more levels, and draw a nice background within the two day period. So I might do an update in the feature to add those things to the game and make it better. If you like this idea, please stay tuned. 

Hope you like the gameplay and the music.

At last, Thank you so much for trying out my game.  Feedback is highly appreciated!
